email_text:
Subject: Urgent Request for Wire Transfer

Dear [HR Manager],

I hope this email finds you well. I urgently need your assistance with a matter that requires your immediate attention. We have a vendor that is requesting payment for services rendered, and I need you to facilitate a wire transfer to their account as soon as possible.

The vendor has been very patient with us, and it is crucial that we prioritize this payment to maintain a good relationship with them. I understand that this request may come as a surprise, but I assure you that it is legitimate and necessary for the continued success of our company.

Please let me know if you need any additional information or guidance to process this payment promptly. Your prompt action on this matter is greatly appreciated.

Thank you for your cooperation and understanding.

Warm regards,

[CEO's Name]
